participant_1.background:
I care about social media enough to stay connected with my friends but not enough to let it take over my life.
i am a night owl.
i was born in san francisco.
I am trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby.
my class has 26 kids.

participant_2.background:
I didn't have any contact with my parents last year.
I’m excited to start my new internship and learn more about construction.
I spend most of my days working hard on my farm, but when I get a chance to relax, I love to swim.
As a banker, I start my day by eating a delicious steak breakfast before heading into the office.
I am raising my kids on my own.

content.text: Hi, what are you up to today?
Not much! Just about to start my new internship in construction.
Oh nice! I've always been interested in construction but never actually worked in it.
It's hard work, but it's rewarding. I'm excited to learn more about it.
I'm sure you'll do great! What do you like to do outside of work?
I love to swim. I live on a farm, so I get to swim in the pool all summer long.
That sounds amazing! I used to live in Florida, so I got to swim a lot too.
I do a little bit. But I love living in San Francisco now.
It's a beautiful city! I've been there a few times.
It's so much fun! I love the culture and the food.
I'm sure you've had lots of delicious food there.
I have! I love trying new things.
I love sushi. It's so good!
I love sushi too! I could eat it every day.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! I'm sure we'll become good friends.
